name: json-format
title: Format JSON
description: Formats a JSON file with a selected indentation. If the JSON is stringified, it will be parsed before formatting.
author: destiner

commands.name: formatClipboard
commands.title: Format Clipboard JSON
commands.description: Formats a JSON/JS Object string stored in clipboard and copies/pastes it back

commands.name: formatSelection
commands.title: Format Selected JSON
commands.description: Formats a JSON/JS Object string selected in the foremost editor and copies/pastes it back

commands.name: formatJsonLines
commands.title: Format Array of JSON to JSONLines
commands.description: Formats an array of JSON/JS Object to JSONLines

preferences.description: Paste the formatted JSON to an active app
preferences.label: Automatically paste the formatted JSON
preferences.name: autopaste
preferences.title: Auto Paste
